author: radekkapka
content: Hey guys, shouldn't https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Beacon/getEpochSyncCommittees be an `eth/v2` endpoint since it deals with sync committees, which themselves are being introduced in Altair?

author: radekkapka
content: Or do `v1`/`v2` only apply when dealing with the same endpoints?

author: radekkapka
content: I presume it's the latter, in which case isn't it an issue that there is no easy way to find all Altair-specific endpoints?

author: ajsutton
content: Could go either way really.  There was a discussion before about whether new apis should start from v1 or v2.  Technically since this is a new API v1 would make sense if we're versioning the endpoint itself, or v2 could mean everything added in v2 or the whole API could be versioned and everything gets a v2 option (I really don't like that last one).  I'm pretty ambivalent about which of the first two we adopt.

author: radekkapka
content: Thanks for the very quick response!
